name: World of Warcraft TCG Card Tooltips
author: Sebastian Zaha

sections.description:
The plugin adds a button in the visual post editor. To use it, just select the text that represents a World of Warcraft card name, and click the button. It will turn the text into a
link to the card’s page on http://deckbox.org You cannot see the mouseover tooltips directly
in the editor, but when you publish or preview the post, hovering over the link will show the card’s information in a tooltip.
sections.installation:
1. Head over to the “Install Plugins” section of your Admin Panel, and use the “Upload” link to install the zip file.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu.
  3. Use the “WoW” button in the editor.

Alternatively, you can search for “WoW TCG” from the Admin panel Plugins section, select this
plugin and click ‘Install’.
sections.faq:
Do you support other games?

Yes, Magic the Gathering is also supported, check out the plugin here:
https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/magic-the-gathering-card-tooltips/
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Small cleanup, test plugin with latest wordpress version

1.0.0

  • Initial plugin release

short_description: Easily transform World of Warcraft card names into links that show the card information in a tooltip when hovering over then.
